panels.description: Percentage of internal-update events that are "compacted", that is, only the last event is actually processed, since the execution of all the events would still lead to the same outcome
panels.title: Current Mean Compression Rate

panels.title: Mean Compression Rate

panels.description: Shows the service CPU actual usage and the deploy request/limit
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Shows the service RAM actual consumption and the deploy request/limit
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: This shows how many find commands where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.
panels.title: Distribution of Find Command Duration

panels.description: This shows how many update with insertion commands where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.
panels.title: Distribution of Upsert Command Duration

panels.description: This shows how many update commands where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.
panels.title: Distribution of Update Command Duration

panels.description: This shows how many delete commands where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.
panels.title: Distribution of Delete Command Duration

panels.description: This shows how many aggregation pipelines where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.
panels.title: Distribution of Aggregate Command Duration

panels.description: This shows how many aggregation pipelines where executed in the given time span and how much they took to execute.

targets.expr:
(sum (rate(mongodb_aggregate_cmd_duration_milliseconds_count{k8sCluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container=~"$container"}[1m])) or vector(0)) +
(sum (rate(mongodb_find_cmd_duration_milliseconds_count{k8sCluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container=~"$container"}[1m])) or vector(0)) +
(sum (rate(mongodb_upsert_cmd_duration_milliseconds_count{k8sCluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container=~"$container"}[1m])) or vector(0)) +
(sum (rate(mongodb_update_cmd_duration_milliseconds_count{k8sCluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container=~"$container"}[1m])) or vector(0)) +
(sum (rate(mongodb_delete_cmd_duration_milliseconds_count{k8sCluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container=~"$container"}[1m])) or vector(0))

panels.title: MongoDB IOps
